VRStageParametersSittingToStandingTransf.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The sittingToStandingTransform read-only property of the interface contains a matrix that transforms the sitting-space view matrices of to standing-space.

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.

remarks.para: Basically, this can be passed into your WebGL code to transform the rendered view from a sitting to standing view.

-WebVR API homepage
- — demos, downloads, and other resources from the Mozilla VR team.

VRStageParametersSittingToStandingTransf.value: A 16-element containing the components of a 4×4 transform matrix.
